channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [CXF-7977] http-undertow|http-jetty transport: Port 8282 is configured with wrong protocol "https" with blueprint configuration
item.description:
Run quickstart security/keycloak/keycloak-cxf according to README.md

Bundle deployment fails with following error:

org.osgi.service.blueprint.container.ComponentDefinitionException: Unable to initialize bean externalJaxWs

item.summary: http-undertow|http-jetty transport: Port 8282 is configured with wrong protocol "https" with blueprint configuration

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
Hi jondruse,

I don't think your change in that PR is correct.

"tlsServerParameters.getClientAuthentication() != null" isn't a compulsory requirement for HTTPS protocol

Freeman

ffang Thank you.

My current results shows, that problem is probably not in cxf. I was able to simulate expected (correct) behavior through cxf's junit tests -> so error is probably somewhere else.
To be sure I'll investigate it more.

Thanks jondruse!

I will close this issue for now, feel free to reopen if it's a issue here

Freeman
ffang is this really not a problem?
The fix should be somewhere else, I'm on it ...
